quote: Besides, I can't get to where I want to go by conscious or unconscious suicide. I've got my strange little life to lead. Leading it the best I can - that's how I buy the ticket to where I want to be.
quote_letters: BESIDES I CANT GET TO WHERE I WANT TO GO BY CONSCIOUS OR UNCONSCIOUS SUICIDE IVE GOT MY STRANGE LITTLE LIFE TO LEAD LEADING IT THE BEST I CAN - THATS HOW I BUY THE TICKET TO WHERE I WANT TO BE
